title: Tondo Relief of the Madonna and Child, Cherub's Head in the Frame
description: cherub (head and wings only; no body) with arching egg and dart decoration below and arching foliage above; hand and foot of other figures visible at LL; mounted on paper (may have been cut from a book; three sides torn straight, one side cut)
creditline: Gift of Rosemary and Elliot Offner in honor of Emily Offner Hollidge
